message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, see if we can do better later.
I think you can do better than that, let's try to get more for myself
You think you can do better? I'll give you a chance to prove it!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up too much!
I'm getting a bit impatient, you're not giving me enough, let's try to speed up the negotiations

I'm trying to find a compromise, but I'm not giving up much more!
